entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
